title: Moto G Power now available for pre-order in United States
content:
Motorola has many, many, many different budget smartphones, most of which carry the long-running Moto G name. One of the more recent additions is the 2022 Moto G Power, a mid-range smartphone with an emphasis on long battery life. The phone has already been available in other countries, but now it’s coming to America later

The post Moto G Power now available for pre-order in United States appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Motorola is bringing one of its newest budget phones to the United States starting March 18, for the price of $199.99.
